content: these are the perfect transition from your standard winter gloves as we move into spring and summer these are so pretty when worn underneath your lightweight coats or even beneath the sleeves of a long sleeve shirt it would also be great to create these using a cool and breathable lightweight cotton yarn for a spring-friendly accessory crocheted using simple stitches they feature a nice lengthy wrist and a romantic bell shape that drops down over your hand pattern download will be available for free shortly buy two patterns from my shoppe and receive one for free
